1617380.name: Hog Hunter 2021: Dev notes + dev cabin code
1617380.description:
This DLC is an optional way to show support to the developer (me). It is not part of the actual game.
As thanks for supporting me you will receive the following:

- A short 14 page collection of developer notes that talk about various aspects of the game.

- A code + instructions on how to access the hidden cabin location in game. This is a small building designed to let players look at and interact with models up close, it has no actual gameplay or hunting. You will need to enter the code provided by this DLC to get to it.

PLEASE NOTE:
The cabin is not a new level, it is essentially just a glorified model viewer in game.

ACCESSING THE FILES
After downloading you should find the files in your game's directory folder labeled DLC:
Hog Hunter 2021 -> Properties -> Browse Local Files.

You will need the code from your local files in order to get into the cabin.
